subject: [Radiance-general] Sunlite - A Sketchup Plugin for fast andeasy 3phase method implementation
body:
Message-ID: <CAM--h54sW=Gyhn8xyhNCXew8JBF7Tbftfx-2YE=fr+1_+BT_1Q@mail.gmail.com>

Dear German,

This plugin looks interesting. However, I can't find any download links.
The Sunlite website's download page says that nothing is available.

Did you release it yet? Let us know where to download it when you do; I'd
love to check it out =).

Also, I don't see what software license you'll be using, but if possible,
please don't encrypt your .rb files!

Regards,
Anthony
